content.raw:
Increase in memory usage maybe partly due to logging. It's pushing data into a buffer at a rate faster than the write thread could write it out to disk. But that doesn't rule out the possibility of a memory leak in laser sensor. I will look into it. 

The crash you are seeing may be related to issue #706 which was fixed in pull request #575. The new debs gazebo 1.8.4 / drcsim 2.6.4 should roll out soonish. Once they are out please try them and see if you still get crashes.
